description: [Kimsuky](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0094) has executed Windows commands by using `cmd` and running batch scripts.(Citation: Talos Kimsuky Nov 2021)(Citation: KISA Operation Muzabi)

external_references.description: An, J and Malhotra, A. (2021, November 10). North Korean attackers use malicious blogs to deliver malware to high-profile South Korean targets. Retrieved December 29, 2021.
KISA. (n.d.). Phishing Target Reconnaissance and Attack Resource Analysis Operation Muzabi. Retrieved March 7, 2022.
